dānzǐyèzhíwù endogen

zhíwùtī frond

shìshì to pass away; to die

cáijiǎn cut out

traditional: 不可磨滅
bùkěmómiè indelible

traditional: 進逼
jìnbī to advance on sth; to press closely (on some goal)
bīrén pressing; threatening
bīgòng extort a confession

bīzhēn lifelike; true to life; distinctly; clearly
bījìn press on towards; close in on; approach; draw near

nónghòu dense; thick (fog, clouds etc); to have a strong interest in; deep; fully saturated (color)

nóngmì thick

nóngdù concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution); consistency; thickness; density; viscosity

traditional: 濃烈
nóngliè (adj) strong (taste, flavour)
